Text.Page: <PCNAME>! Mysterium's agent Legia has something to tell you in the camp of Saleron's Scholars. Go see her at your first opportunity.

The agent greets you, , and delivers a message from the god Saleron himself.

Recently, Salron has let us know that he wanted to see you, . We don't know what the God plans to discuss with . However, when a god calls a mortal by name, it is highly discouraged to ignore such a request.

Ah, , of whose courage and nobility even I have heard. It seems my message has reached you?

I called you here to give you a kind of gift. Don't think of it as a reward. Just know that one day, when I rise from this cold prison, I will need strong allies.

In my opinion, you have a good chance of living up to that point.

If one day the Valkyon Federation will rule the world, I will need an agent I can trust.
